trans-unit.source: Represents a control that provides fundamental window-based functionality within a traditional graphical user interface (GUI).
trans-unit.target: Representa um controlo que fornece funcionalidade baseado no Windows fundamental dentro de uma interface gráfica tradicional (GUI).

trans-unit.source: Examples of controls that support this control pattern include top-level application windows, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mdi](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mdi-md.md)] child windows, modal dialogs and balloon help windows.
trans-unit.target: Controlos que suportem este padrão de controlo exemplos de windows de nível superior da aplicação, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mdi](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mdi-md.md)] janelas subordinadas, caixas de diálogo modais e balão ajudam windows.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o em cache [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de propriedade em cache devem ter sido anteriormente pedidos utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.Current%2A> to get the current value of a property.
trans-unit.target: Utilize <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.Current%2A>para obter o valor atual de uma propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e a sua utilização, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowPatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura que contém o em cache [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para o padrão de controlo.

trans-unit.source: The requested property is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade pedida não está na cache.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowPatternInformation.CanMaximize*> property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowPatternInformation.CanMaximize*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowPatternInformation.CanMaximize*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Este identificador é utilizado por aplicações de cliente de automatização de IU.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Fornecedores de automatização de IU devem utilizar o campo equivalente na <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowPatternInformation.CanMinimize*> property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowPatternInformation.CanMinimize*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowPatternInformation.CanMinimize*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Este identificador é utilizado por aplicações de cliente de automatização de IU.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Fornecedores de automatização de IU devem utilizar o campo equivalente na <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to close the current window.
trans-unit.target: Tentativas para fechar a janela atual.

trans-unit.source: When called on a split pane control, this method will close the pane and remove the associated split.
trans-unit.target: Quando chamado num controlo de painel de divisão, este método irá fechar o painel e remova a divisão associada.

trans-unit.source: This method may also close all other panes depending on implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este método também poderá fechar todas as outras painéis, dependendo da implementação.

trans-unit.source: The control is unable to perform the requested action.
trans-unit.target: O controlo não é possível executar a ação pedida.

trans-unit.source: When the control is no longer available.
trans-unit.target: Quando o controlo já não está disponível.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém atual [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> reference in order to get current values.
trans-unit.target: Este padrão tem de ser de um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>com um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>referência para obter os valores atuais.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>foi obtido utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, contém apenas os dados em cache e tentar obter o valor atual de qualquer propriedade emite uma exceção.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.Cached%2A>para obter o valor em cache de uma propriedade que foi anteriormente especificado utilizando um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.Cached%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e a sua utilização, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowPatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura que contém atual [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para o padrão de controlo.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowPatternInformation.IsModal*> property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowPatternInformation.IsModal*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowPatternInformation.IsModal*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Este identificador é utilizado por aplicações de cliente de automatização de IU.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Fornecedores de automatização de IU devem utilizar o campo equivalente na <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowPatternInformation.IsTopmost*> property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowPatternInformation.IsTopmost*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowPatternInformation.IsTopmost*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Este identificador é utilizado por aplicações de cliente de automatização de IU.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Fornecedores de automatização de IU devem utilizar o campo equivalente na <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern"></xref> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern"> </xref> padrão de controlo.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Este identificador é utilizado por aplicações de cliente de automatização de IU.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Fornecedores de automatização de IU devem utilizar o campo equivalente na <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de padrão é transmitido para métodos de como <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>obter o padrão de controlo de interesse do <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> especificado</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Changes the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.WindowVisualState"></xref> of the window.
trans-unit.target: As alterações a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.WindowVisualState"> </xref> da janela.

trans-unit.source: The requested <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.WindowVisualState"></xref> of the window.
trans-unit.target: O pedido <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.WindowVisualState"> </xref> da janela.

trans-unit.source: A control does not support a requested behavior.
trans-unit.target: Um controlo não suporta um comportamento pedido.

trans-unit.source: Causes the calling code to block for the specified time or until the associated process enters an idle state, whichever completes first.
trans-unit.target: Faz com que o código de chamada bloquear o para o período de tempo especificado ou até que o processo associado aciona um estado inativo, optando-concluir primeiro.

trans-unit.source: This method is typically used in conjunction with the handling of a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPatternIdentifiers.WindowOpenedEvent>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é normalmente utilizado em conjunto com o processamento de um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPatternIdentifiers.WindowOpenedEvent>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPatternIdentifiers.WindowOpenedEvent>

trans-unit.source: The implementation is dependent on the underlying application framework; therefore this method may return some time after the window is ready for user input.
trans-unit.target: A implementação está dependente a estrutura subjacente da aplicação; Por conseguinte, este método pode devolver algum tempo depois da janela está pronta para a entrada de utilizador.

trans-unit.source: The calling code should not rely on this method to ascertain exactly when the window has become idle.
trans-unit.target: O código de chamada não deverá confiar este método para ascertain exatamente quando a janela tornou-se inativo.

trans-unit.source: The amount of time, in milliseconds, to wait for the associated process to become idle.
trans-unit.target: A quantidade de tempo, em milissegundos, a aguardar que o processo associado fiquem inativos.

trans-unit.source: The maximum is <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: O número máximo é <xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the window has entered the idle state; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the timeout occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a janela entrou no estado inativo; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se o limite de tempo excedido.

trans-unit.source: The parameter passed in is not a valid number.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro transmitido não é um número válido.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the event that is raised when a window is closed.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o evento é desencadeado quando uma janela ser fechada.

trans-unit.source: A client application may need to listen for WindowClosedEvent from a cached object since a window is removed from the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] control view structure immediately upon being closed.
trans-unit.target: Poderá ter uma aplicação de cliente escutar WindowClosedEvent de um objeto em cache porque uma janela é removida do [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] controlam a estrutura da vista imediatamente após a ser fechado.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Este identificador é utilizado por aplicações de cliente de automatização de IU.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Fornecedores de automatização de IU devem utilizar o campo equivalente na <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the event that is raised when a window is opened.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o evento é desencadeado quando é aberta uma janela.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.

trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowPatternInformation.WindowVisualState*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowPatternInformation.WindowVisualState*>

trans-unit.target: Fornecedores de automatização de IU devem utilizar o campo equivalente na <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPatternIdentifiers>
